hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# build the tests rm -rf /opt/gobuild/kubernetes cd /opt/gobuild git clone -b ${KUBE_TESTS_BRANCH} https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes.git cd kubernetes make clean yes | make quick-release
# create kube config cat > /opt/gobuild/kubernetes/kubeconfig <<EOF apiVersion: v1 clusters: - cluster: api-version: v1 server: http://pipeletconformance-master.kubeme.io:8080 name: contexts: [] current-context: "" kind: Config preferences: {} users: [] EOF
# run the tests KUBECONFIG=/opt/gobuild/kubernetes/kubeconfig USER=jenkins hack/conformance-test.sh > /opt/gobuild/kubernetes/kraken_${GIT_COMMIT}_conformance.log
# revoke aws lease vault revoke -address=https://vault.kubeme.io -tls-skip-verify $(cat temp.json | jq -r '.lease_id')
